00023 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 //  A define in the build for each project is also used to control whether
00025 //  the export keyword is from the project's viewpoint or the client's.
00026 //  These defines provide the platform specific keywords that they need
00027 //  to do this.
00028 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT     __declspec(dllexport)
00030 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT     __declspec(dllimport)
00031 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT_FUNCTION(T) XALAN_PLATFORM_EXPORT T
00032 #define XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT_FUNCTION(T) XALAN_PLATFORM_IMPORT T
00033 
00034 
00035 #if _MSC_VER >= 1300
00036   #define XALAN_INLINE_INITIALIZATION
00037   #if !defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00038     #define XALAN_INLINE_INITIALIZATION_IS_DEFINITION_BUG
00039    #endif
00040   #define XALAN_NEW_STD_ALLOCATOR
00041   #define XALAN_HAS_STD_ITERATORS
00042   #if _MSC_VER == 1300
00043     #define XALAN_VCPP_USE_PTRIT
00044   #endif
00045 #else
00046   #define XALAN_REQUIRES_QUALIFIED_DESTRUCTOR
00047   #define XALAN_NO_COVARIANT_RETURN_TYPE
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #define XALAN_LSTRSUPPORT
00051 #define XALAN_NEWLINE_IS_CRLF
00052 #define XALAN_HAS_CPP_NAMESPACE
00053 #define XALAN_HAS_STD_DISTANCE
00054 #define XALAN_NO_REENTRANT_TIME_FUNCTIONS
00055 
00056 
00057 #endif  // VCPPDEFINITIONS_HEADER_GUARD_1357924680
